data.text: @WonPeople You're buggered if you're coming from Ukraine

@WonPeople @AvonandsomerRob They just wanna know!
It's for your own good!

@WonPeople Whilst they are a pain in the arse, it was explained why they are being retained.
It is entirely for statistical analysis around travel and vaccinations etc. (May or may not be useful)
It does of course assume nobody tells porkies. 🤣
At least they cost travellers nothing.

@WonPeople I have just been for a test so I can fly to UK on Saturday. Did the forms booked the second test.   The things you have to do is a royal pain in the arse.. And the vaxed who can still catch and spread it dont.
@WonPeople This is the simplified version too (allegedly).  It’s all utter bollocks
@WonPeople Just completed mine now. It’s a pain. But at least I don’t have to complete it every day for work anymore which is a bonus.
